== Prefix Guideline ==
The FWTS team manages all FWTS and FWTS-Live bugs under the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/fwts | FWTS project]]</nowiki> in Launchpad, the team uses "Prefix" in bug subject line to better manage these bugs, following are the prefixes that the team is using:
* '''[FEAT]''' : indicates the bug is a feature request or a new feature the team is working on
* '''[FWTS-Live]''' : indicates the bug is about the FWTS-Live image
* '''[CERT]''' : indicates the bug impacts the Ubuntu certification for certain systems
